Dates on which new valuation lists must be compiled for England
	Section 22B of the Local Government Finance Act [1992 (c.14)](/id/ukpga/1992/14?view=plain "Go to item of legislation") (compilationand maintenance of new valuation lists) is amended as mentioned in subsections(2) to (5).
	After subsection (1) insert—
		“(1A)A new list must be compiled, in relation to billing authorities inEngland, on 1 April in each year specified by order made by the Secretary ofState.”
	In subsection (2), paragraph (a) (first date on which new valuation listmust be compiled in relation to billing authorities in England), and the word“and” following it, are repealed.
	In subsection (3) (subsequent dates on which new lists must be compiled)—
		after “a new list must be compiled” insert “in relation to billingauthorities in Wales”;
		the words from the beginning of paragraph (a) to “Wales,” in paragraph (b)are repealed.
	In subsection (11) for “subsection (3)(a)” substitute “subsection (1A)”.
	In section 113 of that Act (orders and regulations), in subsection (3)(a),for “22B(3)(a),” substitute “22B(1A),”.
	In the Local Government Act [2003 (c. 26)](/id/ukpga/2003/26?view=plain "Goto item of legislation"), in Schedule 7 (minor and consequential amendments),paragraph 52(4) is repealed.
Short title and extent
	This Act may be cited as the Council Tax (New Valuation Lists for England)Act 2006.
	The amendments and repeals made by this Act have the same extent as theenactments to which they relate.
